pages.text: • It is recommended to read the other categories of this book. They provide useful information regarding performance boosts, links, and more to come!$(br)• Enhancing Performance has chapters with recommendations for anyone who needs a boost in performance; reading the $(l:performance_1)Better Performance$() chapter is where one can start.

• The Useful Links category has multiple chapters regarding where to$(br)$(l:getting_support)get support$(), and more. Checking it out is highly recommended.$(br)• Make sure you also check out the $(l:discord)official Discord$() of the modpack. In there you could find more useful tips & discuss the gameplay with the community.$(br)• Months of development went into the making of this modpack - remember to have fun playing! That is what the modpack was created for.
